definitions.title: vb. weigh
definitions.body: (Ar. sala0’a pay promptly Lane:1398; cf. Sab. [[סלא]] consecrate, devote Hom:ZMG xivi (1892), 531; Süd-Arab. Chrest. 124);—only

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[הַמְסֻלָּאִים בַּפָָּז]] La 4:2 they who were weighed against gold, reckoned of such value.—Cf. also II. [[סלה]].
